item.description:
ISPE Boston Area Chapter's
20th Anniversary - Luau Style

Thursday, June 28, 2012
Think Tank, Cambridge, MA
Registration and Social: 6:00 pm to 10:00 pm

Join your friends and colleagues in celebrating our Chapter's 20th birthday! Network with members you know and meet new members and guests. Have a Hawaiian shirt or luau attire? Wear it. Ono (delicious) appetizers will be served.

http://www.ispeboston.org/files/ispe_june_28%2C_2012_social_flyer.pdf

http://www.ispeboston.org/events/registration.htm?eventID=261
item.name: ISPE Boston Area Chapter's 20th Anniversary - Luau Style
